permissions: Admins can delete inspections. Non-admins can delete inspections if they are the inspection creator on a persisted record, a member of the broker tied to the inspection, a member of the customer tied to the inspection with permission to view the job production plan, a manager member of the job production plan developer, a job production plan inspector, or the driver on the tender job schedule shift when the job production plan expects an inspection.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (inspection ID). --confirm is required to delete.
